label: uncl4457
comment: Code specifying the conditions under which substitution may take place.

values.label: No substitution allowed
values.comment: Notice to supplier to fill order exactly as specified.

values.label: Supply any binding if edition ordered not available
values.comment: Indicates that substitute bindings are acceptable if the edition of a book originally ordered is unavailable.

values.label: Supply paper binding if edition ordered not available
values.comment: Indicates that a paper back edition of a book is acceptable if the edition ordered is unavailable.

values.label: Supply cloth binding if edition ordered not available
values.comment: Indicates that the cloth bound edition of a book is acceptable if the edition ordered is unavailable.

values.label: Supply library binding if edition ordered not available
values.comment: Indicates that a library binding of a book is acceptable if the edition ordered is unavailable.

values.label: Equivalent item substitution
values.comment: Indicates that an item of the same value and performance may be substituted for the item specified.

values.label: Alternate item substitution allowed
values.comment: Indicates that an item of equal or greater value and performance may be substituted for the item specified.

values.label: Mutually defined
values.comment: A code reserved for special trading partner requirements when pre-defined codes do not exist.
